Projects

01

Koodle- E-Learing Web App

Developed a Course Selling multiuser E-learning platform that allows users to browse through a list of courses, view course details, and purchase courses using the Razorpay payment gateway. The app also includes features like user authentication, course management, and payment processing.

02

CineAI-Movie HUB

CineAI is a movie discovery web app built with React, Vite, and Firebase, offering features like user authentication, movie browsing with TMDB API integration, and AI-driven movie suggestions using Gemini API. It provides a responsive UI with optimized performance, allowing users to explore, watch trailers, and get detailed movie information.

03

Text Summarizer-bart

The Text Summarizer is an application built using Hugging Face's pre-trained models, designed to generate concise summaries from longer text inputs. It leverages state-of-the-art NLP techniques to process and condense content, providing users with clear and relevant summaries in seconds. The tool is highly efficient, offering a seamless experience for anyone needing quick text summarization.

04

Password-Generator

Designed and developed a web application that generates random passwords based on user preferences. The app allows users to choose the length of the password and select the types of characters to include, such as uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.
